channel.title: Getting_started on संस्कृत-साङ्गणकाः Sanskrit Programmers
channel.description: Recent content in Getting_started on संस्कृत-साङ्गणकाः Sanskrit Programmers

item.title: Motivations
item.description: Following discussions (1, 2) in the samskrita mailing list and some positive responses, we have started this project. Volunteer effort is a labor of love, and many of us here carry deep sentiments, an emotional attachment, about saMskRta. In fact, many of us yearn for the day saMskRta is revived as a spoken language, even as we use it whenever possible in our daily life. That is why contributing to sanskrit tools is a natural outlet.

item.title: संस्कृत-साङ्गणकाः Sanskrit coders
item.description: हरिः ॐ! स्वागतम्! We are open source Sanskrit programmers. Contact Contributors (and users with questions) are welcome to join the sanskrit-programmers mailing list. Channels of communication: Telegram here. Whatsapp group here. slack here. Inactive as of 2018: gitter-chat-room here. Purpose of this site Catalog software and technical info relevant to sanskrit users and coders. Related sites. Technical Hindi. Ajit’s software and dict files.
